content: havana black round 1 ​ make 6sc in m r 6 stitches round 2 ​ increase single_crochet three times 9 stitches round 3 ​ single_crochet increase single_crochet three times 12 stitches round 4 ​4sc increase 7sc 13 stitches round 5 ​ 10sc increase single_crochet increase 15 stitches round 6 ​ 10sc increase 2sc increase single_crochet 17 stitches round 7 ​11sc b s 2sc b s 2sc 17 stitches now is a good time to add the safety eyes if using mine are between rounds 4 and 5 round 8 ​4sc decrease 11sc 16 stitches rounds 9-10 ​single_crochet around for two rounds 16 stitches in each round round 11 ​ increase 2sc three times increase 6sc 20 stitches rounds 12-13 ​single_crochet around for two rounds 20 stitches in each round stuff the head round 14 ​ 5sc decrease 2sc decrease 9sc 18 stitches round 15 ​4sc decrease 2sc decrease 8sc 16 stitches round 16 ​ decrease 2sc four times 12 stitches stuff the body round 17 ​decrease six times 6 stitches fasten_off leaving a long tail for sewing close by drawing the tail through the last 6 stitches draw tight and fasten weave in end © laura s pixie patch 3 back legs make 2 for a tutorial on making and sewing the legs please visit ​https //youtu be/o8v_dviouzg row 1 chain 5 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and each of the next 3 chain 4 stitches row 2 chain 1 turn single_crochet across 4 stitches row 3 chain 1 fold work in half lengthwise and putting the hook through both the single_crochet of the last row and the back of the starting chain slip_stitch across 4 stitches fasten_off and sew legs either side of the body to about half way along the leg leaving the rest free tail row 1 l​eaving a long tail to your slip knot chain 3 single_crochet in 2nd and 3rd chains from hook 2 stitches row 2 c​ hain 1 turn single_crochet across 2 stitches row 3 t​ urn do not chain 1 decrease 1 stitch fasten_off leaving a long tail for sewing use the tail of the starting stitch to sew the base onto the base of the bunny level with the back legs use the finishing tail to anchor the tip of the tail just above row 17 of the body use a wire brush if you would like to give the tail a fluffy look ears make 2 chain 4 single_crochet into second chain from hook and next chain single_crochet double_crochet chain 2 single_crochet into back bump of second chain from hook double_crochet single_crochet all into the third chain 2 single_crochet along back of the chain finish off leaving a long tail for sewing pinch the base of the ear together to shape and sew onto the top of the head level with rounds six and seven i like to angle the ears in a v with the front of the ears closer to the sides of the head and the
